name: Wizbirds Online
description:
Join the adventure...

Become an avian wizard! Choose your magical powers, fight fantastical mobs, collect equipment, and level up. Wizbirds Online is a free side-scrolling MMORPG where you fight with magic only.

Make allies, become foes, or focus on beating the baddies. Duke it out at the arena or in the filthy PvP zone of Bubbling Bog. Go the PvE route and collect XP, coins, and rare drops. In Wizbirds, you can snipe with water, shoot balls of fire, and electrify your opponent.

Looking to do something more relaxing? Grab a fishing pole and find a spot to catch those sea bois. Once you have plenty of fish, find the nearest shop and sell 'em to make $$$!

Features:  

  • Player vs Environment (PvE)
  • Player vs Player (PvP)
  • Fishing Skill
  • Shops & Drops
  • Hats, Armor, and Buffs
  • Character customization
  • Buy, Sell, or Trade
  • Achievement-based Titles
  • Agility & Parkour Course
  • Magic spell customization

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys
  • Left/Right Mouse
  • Space Bar (to run)
  • A (to sit)
  • Z, X, C (attack)
  • Tilde key
  • F1
  • M, E, T, J, O (shortcuts)
